name: Hop Hop! The Quest For Freedom
name_original: Hop Hop! The Quest For Freedom
description:
You are a bunny fella who lives in a society that suffers of discrimination from other species!
Despite the mouthful, that is the awful truth, and no one wants to put up with it!

So it comes you, on an average monday, to find reason behind all of this.

Hop on top of enemies to defeat them!
Collect 25 Rombs and you will get health!
And, make sure to make it to the next level quick, otherwise you will get stressed out of your mind!

Spray on top of those prohibited signs and show those animals who can part of!Go, Go, GO!!

(Not licensed by Nintendo)
